*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin to James F. Perry, Mexico, October 23, 1833. Congress favorable to repeal of restrictions on immigration from the United States. State organization still unsettled and little hope of success.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Mexico */location_mentioned**date_mentioned n="10-23-1833">23 October 1833*/date_mentioned*.*/p* *p*Dr *person_mentioned*Brother*/person_mentioned*,*/p*
*p*It gives me much pleasure to inform you that the decree repealing the 11 article of the law of *date_mentioned n="04-06-1830">6 April 1830*/date_mentioned* passed the *person_mentioned*chamber of deputies*/person_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="10-24-1833">yesterday */date_mentioned*almost unanimously, and was discussed today in the *person_mentioned*senate */person_mentioned*and two articles were approved (there are three articles in the decree) when the *person_mentioned*senate */person_mentioned*adjourned. There was strong opposition in the *person_mentioned*senate */person_mentioned*on the ground that the *person_mentioned*Govt, of the *location_mentioned*U. S*/location_mentioned*.*/person_mentioned* would take *location_mentioned*Texas */location_mentioned*if any more were alowed to come in from that *location_mentioned*nation */location_mentioned*and many other very foolish and absurd objections, but the majority were in favor of the law and I am told there is no doubt the other article will pass *date_mentioned n="10-24-1833">tomorrow*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Genl. Santana*/person_mentioned* is expected in the *location_mentioned*city */location_mentioned*in *date_mentioned n="10-26-1833">three days*/date_mentioned* and after he arrives I will try (a final tryal) on the *location_mentioned*state */location_mentioned*question. I told the *person_mentioned*vice President*/person_mentioned* the other day that *location_mentioned*Texas */location_mentioned*must be made a *location_mentioned*state */location_mentioned*by the *person_mentioned*Govt*/person_mentioned*, or she would make herself one. This he took as a threat and became very much enraged—however when he understood that my object was only to state a positive fact which it was my duty to state, he was reconciled. I had told him and the *person_mentioned*ministers */person_mentioned*the same thing ever since I came here. The fact is this *person_mentioned*govt*/person_mentioned*, ought to make a *location_mentioned*state of Texas*/location_mentioned*, or transfer her to the *location_mentioned*U. S.*/location_mentioned* without delay and there is some probability at this time that one or the other will be done. A short time now will determine this matter in some way No one writes to me from *location_mentioned*Texas */location_mentioned*I hope you have taken possession of all my papers desk etc that is if it be true as reported here that *person_mentioned*Williams */person_mentioned*is dead, which I hope to God is not the case. I left blanks signed to close the *location_mentioned*coast colony*/location_mentioned* and should they fall into bad hands an improper use might be made of them— take possession of them all—*/p*
*p*I have had to draw on *location_mentioned*Orleans */location_mentioned*for one thousand dollars. This trip will cost me very dear, but I care nothing about that if either of the two events above mentioned can take place, or if any good results to *location_mentioned*Texas */location_mentioned*and its *person_mentioned*inhabitants*/person_mentioned*— all my desires and ambition are limited to the sole object of benefiting that *location_mentioned*country*/location_mentioned*—tho I must confess that some of the *person_mentioned*good folks*/person_mentioned* there irritate me very much sometimes with their personal animosities and jealousies—but it is of short duration.*/p*
*p*Love to my beloved *person_mentioned*Sister */person_mentioned*and all the *person_mentioned*children */person_mentioned*and to your *person_mentioned*neighbors*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Your *person_mentioned*brother*/person_mentioned* *person_mentioned*S*/person_mentioned*_______*/p*
*p*I have written every mail since my arrival here on the *date_mentioned n="07-18-1833">18 July*/date_mentioned*— [Addressed:] *person_mentioned*Mr. James F. Perry Merchant */person_mentioned* *location_mentioned*San Felipe de Austin Texas*/location_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
